The holiday shopping season is in full swing, and Amazon Black Friday 2021 deals are finally here. Whether you're looking for the perfect Christmas gifts, some top-rated tech or something for your kitchen to make holiday cooking less stressful, the online shopping giant has some of the best Black Friday 2021 deals you can find online. Whatever you need this holiday season, Amazon has you covered.

Tackle your holiday shopping with deals and expert advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the deal-hunting team at Reviewed.

Below, you'll find Amazon Black Friday 2021 deals on our favorite Roomba, a top-rated outdoor smart plug and an Apple Pencil, all of which have been vetted by our team of deals experts to make sure they're "best of web" prices. Meanwhile, you can check off even more things on your holiday shopping list and save big with markdowns on must-have products during Best Buy and Walmart's early Black Friday sales.

If you're not already an Amazon Prime subscriber, you can sign up for a 30-day membership for free to gain early access to plenty of Amazon Black Friday deals. An Amazon Prime subscription gets you free two-day shipping, plus tons of other benefits, for $12.99 a month ($6.49 for students and $5.99 for those receiving qualifying government assistance).

The 5 best Amazon Black Friday 2021 deals you can get today

1. Save $150: Our favorite Roomba 

During the holidays, cleaning is probably the last thing on your mind. Luckily, with a robot vacuum, you can keep your home in tip-top shape with minimal effort. The iRobot Roomba j7+ is the best Roomba we've ever tested, and, right now, you can take home the self-emptying robot vacuum for just $699, $150.99 off the full $849.99 list price and one of the lowest prices we've ever seen. We think this robot vacuum is iRobot's best Roomba yet and found it to have excellent navigation and cleaning capabilities. In testing, the j7+ easily maneuvered around furniture and dog poop and picked up just as much dirt as a full-sized vacuum. 

Get the iRobot Roomba j7+ Self-Emptying Robot Vacuum for $699 (Save $150.99)

2. Under $100: This customer-favorite microphone 

Whether you want to dip your toes into the world of podcasting or upgrade your audio capabilities while working remotely, a USB microphone can help you do all that and more. The Blue Yeti USB Mic is one of our favorite microphones and, currently, it's on sale for just $99.99—$30 off the original $129.99 list price. While we had some trouble positioning the microphone on the included stand, we found this model had crisp and clean audio and were impressed with the mic gain control and pickup pattern adjustment capabilities. 

Get the Blue Yeti USB Mic for $99.99 (Save $30)

3. Up to 40% off: Top-tier toys for kids and toddlers  

Shop holiday gifts for your little ones at Black Friday-caliber prices right now at Amazon. Today, you can save as much as 40% on dolls and playsets from kid-approved brands, including L.O.L. Surprise!, Journey Girls and Calico Critters. For a present sure to please, consider the L.O.L Surprise! OMG Sweets fashion doll, currently on sale for $19.99—29% off the full $27.99 list price. This collectible package comes with the stylish Sweets doll and features 20 surprises, including matching clothes and accessories.

Save up to 40% on toys from L.O.L Surprise!, Journey Girls, Calico Critters and more  

4. Under $16: This waterproof outdoor smart plug

Take your holiday light display to the next level with a Kasa outdoor smart plug. This Wi-Fi-enabled outlet has two AC sockets that can be independently controlled using the Kasa app or voice control when you connect the device to your Alexa or Google Home Assistant. The weather-resistant plug is designed for use with landscape lighting and holiday lights and can even be controlled using a countdown timer, so your lights can automatically turn on and off at your desired times. Usually retailing for $24.99, you can take home this smart home essential for just $15.99 right now—a savings of $9. 

Get the Kasa Outdoor Smart Plug for $15.99 (Save $9)  

5. A 19% markdown: This top-rated smart stylus  

Whether you want to take notes, draw pictures or edit documents, the Apple Pencil can do all that and more. This sleek stylus is designed to replace traditional writing instruments and is compatible with most iPad models—including the iPad (6th generation), iPad Pro (1st and 2nd generation), iPad mini (5th generation) and iPad Air (3rd generation). In testing, we found the gadget to be an especially great choice for students, artists and people who primarily use their iPad for work. "If you're looking to ditch the traditional pen and paper notebooks, then the Apple Pencil, paired with a compatible iPad, makes for an easy-to-use replacement," our tester said. If you're looking to get your hands on the iPad accessory, you can take one home today for just $79.99—$19.01 off the full $99 list price. 

Get the Apple Pencil for $79.99 (Save $19.01)  

Amazon Black Friday deals you may have missed 

1. Samsung Galaxy Watch Active 2

Android users wanting to get into the world of smartwatches should consider the Samsung Galaxy Watch Active 2. Typically listed for $249.99, the 40mm model is now available for $199.99 thanks to a 20% discount. We named the slightly-larger 44mm model of the Active 2 one of our favorite smartwatches for its large and bright AMOLED screen as well as its near-three-day battery life (depending on use). It's also an excellent overall fitness tracker, able to keep an eye on your calorie intake and how well you sleep.

Get the Samsung Galaxy Watch Active 2 40mm for $199.99 (Save $50)

2. 23andMe Ancestry + Traits DNA Testing Kit

If you want to find out more about your roots, 23andMe can help you connect. You can get one of the brand's testing kits with the Traits feature added all together for $79—a $20 price cut from its standard tag of $99. When we tested the combo kit, our tester enjoyed reading about her DNA and found the information provided both "interesting and valuable." She said the Traits add-on to be a fun way to find out what physical traits you could have—even if it didn't always hit the mark.

Get the 23andMe Ancestry + Traits DNA Testing Kit for $79 (Save $20)

3. Apple AirPods Pro

We think the Apple AirPods Pro are some of the best headphones available right now, and you can get the updated version for the lowest price we've ever seen. We love the Pros for the Active Noise Cancellation that dampened environmental noise and the customizable fit of the buds. This new version adds MagSafe, which means you can hold it near a MagSafe charger and it will snap firmly into place and start charging. Get them now for $189.99—a $59.01 price cut from the $249 list price. (Something to consider: Adding two years of Apple Care+ for protection against damage for $29).

Get the Apple AirPods Pro for $189.99 (Save $59.01)

4. Toshiba 65-Inch 4K UHD Smart Fire TV

Give your home media room a major visual upgrade with this 65-inch Toshiba 4K UHD Smart Fire TV, on sale for $529.99. This 4K LED panel is usually priced at $719.99, but right now Amazon is offering it at a 26% discount. As a Fire TV, the Toshiba can bring your favorite streaming services and over-the-air channels together on one screen. Toshiba says the TV comes packed with a "high-performance 4K engine" to offer crisp and clear imagery.

Get the Toshiba 65-Inch LED 4K UHD Smart Fire TV for $529.99 (Save $190)

5. DeWalt Large Toolbox

Keep your workshop essentials organized and secure with this DeWalt large toolbox on sale for $34.97. Normally priced at $47.50, Amazon is selling the hardware carrier at a 26% discount. DeWalt says the box is made with a 4-millimeter thick structural foam box wall and an integrated water seal to protect your tools from any drop or water damage. 

Get the DeWalt Large Toolbox for $34.97 (Save $12.53)

When is Amazon Black Friday 2021? 

Amazon Black Friday 2021 deals are in full swing. This year, Amazon kicked off its holiday shopping season earlier than ever. The popular online retailer announced its first wave of Black Friday sales on October 4 , with markdowns across all categories. We expect to see even deeper discounts on everything from kitchen essentials and electronics to toys and fashion pieces in the coming weeks. 

What are the best deals from the Amazon Black Friday 2021 sale? 

To date, we've seen massive Amazon Black Friday deals on air fryers, headphones, home goods and more—including tons of products from some of our favorite brands, like Apple, KitchenAid, Instant Pot, Sony, Bose, iRobot and Shark.

Every day Amazon adds even more sales to their lineup of Black Friday 2021 deals. Be sure to bookmark this page and check back frequently to scoop the hottest Amazon discounts on must-have items this holiday season. 

Are Amazon Black Friday sales available online? 

Yes. Amazon Black Friday sales are exclusively available online. 

What's the difference between Amazon Black Friday deals and Amazon Cyber Monday deals? 

With Amazon Black Friday deals already here, the early holiday sales double as both Black Friday discounts and pre-Cyber Monday deals. While, technically, Amazon Cyber Monday deals roll out as soon as Black Friday ends on November 26 , we expect to see significant overlap in Amazon's roundup of Black Friday and Cyber Monday markdowns. Both waves of holiday deals will be exclusively available online, so be sure to secure your Amazon Prime membership ahead of time to enjoy fast and free shipping. 

Does Amazon have special Black Friday deals for Amazon Prime members? 

Yes. During the holiday shopping season, Amazon Prime members have early access to select holiday deals and can even earn up to 25% back on select Amazon purchases with an Amazon Prime Card and an eligible Prime membership. Meanwhile, Prime members can get their holiday gifts quicker with access to free and fast shipping, with millions of must-have items available for same-day delivery. If you aren't already an Amazon Prime member, don't worry—there's still plenty of time to sign up.    

When does the Amazon Black Friday sale end? 

The Amazon Black Friday sale ends on November 26 , with Amazon Cyber Monday deals rolling out the following day, on November 27 . Keep in mind, however, that many of the markdowns included in the Amazon Black Friday sale are one-day deals. 

Following the Black Friday and Cyber Monday weekend of sales, we expect to see discounts on select items throughout the holiday season—however, with shipping delays and stock shortages expected, we recommend shopping early to ensure you get all the holiday gifts on your list this year.
